title: Set file name as description
body: It would be very convenient to match the files
author: PilaScat

comments.body: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
Take the video/image description and set it as filename
Currently you set the table height to medium, which will display their descriptions.
When you have thousands of media it is very difficult to manage
Do you think it would be helpful to manage many files by not showing the time but showing their description when the table height is Small?

> Do you think it would be helpful to manage many files by not showing the time but showing their description when the table height is Small?

It would be more for future management outside this software
In version 0.1.13, improvements have been made.

title: Archived Chats cannot be found
body: When searching for an archived chat it cannot be found. After unarchiving, it gets found instantly. It would be nice to get a setting to enable this feature.
author: nudelmaker

comments.body: Wow. Thanks for the fast implementation. Working great!

title: Optimization suggestions
body: 1.I have a suggestion. Can you generate corresponding folders for different channels or groups when downloading, instead of putting all channel files in one place?
author: XINGYUOU

comments.body: Currently, it is not possible to specify a folder for downloads. The ability to automatically transfer files based on rules will be added later.
Automatic file transfer is already supported in version 0.1.12
